Leslie Samuelrich Picked for Selective Forbes List

Leslie Samuelrich, President of Green Century Funds°, was named to Forbes’ 50 Over 50 list in the investment category.

Read More
Photo by John Wollwerth on Wollwerth Imagery
Okefenokee Protected - For Now

“For four years, Green Century has pressed companies to avoid mining or selling products containing materials mined at the Okefenokee National Wildlife Refuge,” said Leslie Samuelrich, president of Green Century Funds. “Twin Pines’ move to sell this land only reinforces our position that mining at the Okefenokee quite simply isn’t worth the risks.”

Learn More

Money Talks Blog

In the face of new attacks on our national environmental laws to protect the air, water and land we cherish, we sometimes feel powerless.

Read More
Photo by Createasea on Unsplash
April 1, 2025
Plastics – What Can We Do?

This month has been dubbed Plastic Free July and you may have read articles this year about people trying to live without plastic for a week – and finding out that it’s all but impossible. Single-use plastics are everywhere. Why is that a problem and what can be done about it?

Read More

About Our Environmental Impact

We persuade companies to become more environmentally responsible to make our world cleaner and safer.

A sustainable investment strategy which incorporates environmental, social and governance criteria may result in lower or higher returns than an investment strategy that does not include such criteria.
